fields.name: Blue Plush Cat Bed
fields.description: If you are on the lookout for a particularly cosy bed for your pet to relax and sleep in, the Plush Cat Bed is an excellent choice. The baby blue colour makes it a charming addition to your pet’s accessories. What’s more, it is extremely comfortable to lie on.This bed makes your pet feel very relaxed and at home thanks to its round shape and soft cushioning. It is wonderfully fluffy and is the perfect place for your pet to nestle up in. It offers your beloved pet a sense of comfort and security. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 20 x 50 x 40cm

fields.name: White Plush Cat Bed
fields.description: If you are on the lookout for a particularly cosy bed for your pet to relax and sleep in, the Plush Cat Bed is an excellent choice. The baby blue colour makes it a charming addition to your pet’s accessories. What’s more, it is extremely comfortable to lie on.This bed makes your pet feel very relaxed and at home thanks to its round shape and soft cushioning. It is wonderfully fluffy and is the perfect place for your pet to nestle up in. It offers your beloved pet a sense of comfort and security. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 20 x 50 x 40cm

fields.name: Snuggle Grey Cat Bed
fields.description: The Cozy Kingdom Snuggle Bed is a majestic place to curl up for a peaceful rest and dream.Your pet will feel safe and protected when it's cuddled up to the cosy, well-padded, high edge and it is bound to enjoy a restful sleep and happy dreams. The outside of the snuggle bed is covered in a luxurious grey textured material, which contrasts beautifully with the light beige fleece lining on the inside. There is also a removable cushion with the grey material on one side and the beige material on the other. You can change the look of the bed just by flipping the cushion over. And if the bed needs freshening up you can simply wash the cushion separately, without having to wash the entire bed. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 20 x 50 x 40cm

fields.name: Hexagon Wooden Cat Pod
fields.description: Up, down, and around, the cat's life is much like a busy bee. The Hexagon Cat Pod brings a fresh stylish addition to the cat's world.To fit the lifestyle of the cat,the product is hexagonal in shape allowing for modular design. Having four openings, each unit can be attached to any other Busy Cat to form a honeycomb-like structure. Our unique design allows the consumer to be as creative as they want while catering to the cat's needs.Easily build the cat wall in your home. And perfectly fit in any interior design. Wall mounted cat shelves are a great space saving idea for small spaces and apartments when you don't want to take up valuable floor space. More importantly, cat wall climbing shelves allow your cats to explore and lounge up high, which cats love. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 150 x 150 x 40cm

fields.name: Small Cat Tree
fields.description: The classic, svelte lines of the Small Cat Tree will not only look good in your home but also give your feline friend great enjoyment as well as comfort. The luxurious plush covered unit is on two levels and comes with a strong sisal post which allows cats to carry out their natural instinct to scratch, to prevent their claws from breaking or being ripped out. Now, hopefully, scratching your furniture will be a thing of the past! Approximate Dimensions (Product): 103 x 35 x 35cm

fields.name: Luxury Cat Tree
fields.description: The Luxury cat tree has everything your cat could wish for and it is made from natural materials which look great and match your décor. It turns this cat tree into something very special. The base is made from solid wood so it is very stable and the tree will remain steady even when your cat is enjoying extensive scratching sessions on the sisal-covered posts. There are various areas where your cat can curl up and sleep or keep an eye on things. The round den is made from woven water hyacinth. Your pet will love to hide away in this cosy den, where it will feel safe and secure. There is also a large, padded platform with a raised edge where your cat can survey its territory. It is a good size even for larger cat breeds. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 153 x 49.5 x 49.5cm

fields.name: Space Bubble Pet Carrier Yellow
fields.description: Made of premium material, durable, breathable and comfortable. Transparent design, allow your pet to view sunshine and scenery from the outside world. Several ventilation holes on the side of the backpack, provide suffient air circulation, make your pet breathe comfortably. Detachable soft bottom mat, easy for cleaning, more hygienic Smooth zipper, easy to open and close, durable and practical Ergonomic widen shoulder strap, make you carry your pet effortlessly. Perfect for travelling, walking, hiking and hanging out. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 43.5 x 23 x 26cm

fields.name: Space Bubble Pet Carrier Pink
fields.description: Made of premium material, durable, breathable and comfortable. Transparent design, allow your pet to view sunshine and scenery from the outside world. Several ventilation holes on the side of the backpack, provide suffient air circulation, make your pet breathe comfortably Secure built-in locking mechanism, prevent your pet from jumpping out, getting lost or hurt themselves. Detachable soft bottom mat, easy for cleaning, more hygienic Smooth zipper, easy to open and close, durable and practical. Ergonomic widen shoulder strap, make you carry your pet effortlessly. Perfect for travelling, walking, hiking and hanging out. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 43.5 x 23 x 26cm

fields.name: Wicker Cat Carrier
fields.description: The Trixie Wicker Cat Basket is a classic wicker cave that can be used as both a cosy den and a secure transportbox for your cat. The natural material makes this den an inviting and warm little hiding place where your cat can feel safe and snuggly. Simply remove the metal barred door, place the den in your cat's favourite corner, and watch your cat fall in love with its new hiding place.On the top of the Trixie Wicker Cat Basket is a practical and comfortable wicker carrying handle, making this a perfect way of transporting your cat on trips to the vet, moving house, or just going on an adventure together. The barred door closes off the front of the den securely and is fastened with a wooden toggle. Your pet will be safe and secure inside, and the fastening is easy to open again when you reach your destination. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 43.5 x 23 x 26cm

fields.name: Foldable Cat Carrier
fields.description: This Pink Fabric Carrier is not only stylish, it is also ideal pet carrier for travel and outdoor use. With shoulder strap and handles for easy transportation and a collar clip for extra security. This Fabric Carrier will help keep your pet safe and secure and make those journeys more relaxing and comfortable for you and your pet.Approximate Dimensions (Product): 43.5 x 23 x 26cm

fields.name: Interactive Feeder
fields.description: The Interactive Feeder speaks to your cat's natural need for both physical activity and mental challenges Thanks to a range of different play opportunities with differing levels of difficulty, it is also the ideal toy for older pets and cats with illnesses that limit their mobility. There are five different sections that each offer a selection of challenges. In some areas of the Trixie Cat Activity Fun Board, your cat's dexterity will be tested, whilst others offer constructive activities as well as plenty of opportunities to play! Approximate Dimensions (Product): 15.5 x 10 x 24.5cm

fields.name: Tower Interactive Maze
fields.description: The Tower Interactive Food Maze will help to keep your cat on its toes, mentally and physically. And it can feed at the same time. The innovative Food Maze challenges various senses. Your cat will be kept amused for ages, will not gobble its food and will also have fun while eating. This is a great way to make sure your cat does not get bored. Your cat has very developed senses. Their sensitive hearing can pick up things which we can’t and they can see things we can only imagine. And we can only start to guess at what they are able to smell and taste. Your cat can put its paws into the side openings and is able to move the food through the labyrinth. The food falls out at the bottom into a feeding bowl where your cat can feed from. You can increase the challenge by turning the disc on the middle level. This will reduce the size of the gap where the food falls through and will increase the level of difficulty. Approximate Dimensions (Product): 24.5 x 27 x 24.5cm

fields.name: SlimCat Food Dispensing Toy
fields.description: About 50% of cats show signs of obesity. The PetSafe SlimCat Food Dispensing Cat Toy is an interactive feeding ball that gives your cat portion control and exercise. The SlimCat toy increases feline activity, decreases excessive eating and improves behavioural problems associated with boredom such as excessive meowing, scratching or aggression. The toy distributes an adjustable amount of dry food as your cat plays with it. By providing smaller portions of food throughout the day, it helps to maintain optimum weight as well as improve your cat's digestion. It's great for cats of all sizes, especially overweight cats. Fill with a healthy portion of dry food and watch your cat shape up on their own.

fields.name: Kong Cat Wand
fields.description: Kong cat toys encourage play, satisfying instinctual needs and strengthening the bond between cat and pet parent. Kong cat toys offer mental and physical stimulation all while meeting a cats need to play.The wand is sure to bring out the playful tiger in any cat. Durable and safe, this item is for supervised play only. Motion  sparks hunting instincts for healthy, active play Approximate Dimensions (Product): 2 x 4 x 51cm
